Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily experience. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it truly stands out in its category. I believe in its value and am confident it could be a game-changer for you. For this exceptional product, I am offering it at an introductory price of $85. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
